com.vaadin.server.communication
Class PersistenceUIInitHandler

java.lang.Object
  ServletUIInitHandler
      com.vaadin.server.communication.PersistenceUIInitHandler

public class PersistenceUIInitHandler
extends ServletUIInitHandler

The PersistenceUIInitHandler extends the ServletUIInitHandler so that the correct UI can be displayed when a session is continued. This is done by overriding the synchronizedHandleRequest method. Currently the implementation only shows the first UI in a session.

Author:
mrosin

public boolean synchronizedHandleRequest(VaadinSession session,

The synchronizedHandleRequest is overridden so that the first UI in a session is shown when a session is re-initialized.

getInitialUidl

protected java.lang.String getInitialUidl(VaadinRequest request,
                                          UI uI)
                                   throws JSONException,
                                          java.io.IOException
Generates the initial UIDL message that can e.g. be included in a html page to avoid a separate round trip just for getting the UIDL.

Parameters:
request - the request that caused the initialization
uI - the UI for which the UIDL should be generated
Returns:
a string with the initial UIDL message
Throws:
JSONException - if an exception occurs while encoding output
java.io.IOException

getSecurityKeyUIDL

private static java.lang.String getSecurityKeyUIDL(VaadinSession session)
Gets the security key (and generates one if needed) as UIDL.

Parameters:
session - the vaadin session to which the security key belongs
Returns:
the security key UIDL or "" if the feature is turned off
